title: Shattered
description: With her mother lost to her at fifteen, it feels like Jade's life is totally, and utterly, destroyed. As an only child, living in a run-down council estate with a dad who's never home, Jade has never felt so alone.After a drunken party with friends, Jade's father finds himself in an impossible situation – and before he knows it, the police are on the look for him.Jade is being pounded with the pressure from her dad, but she can't bear it. She makes efforts to escape, leaving with nothing but her talent – singing.Out there, Jade's never been in so much danger. Seeking to live in an abandoned house, she meets someone very special there, someone that could just change her life …In front of a microphone and a massive audience, all Jade can do now is sing her heart out, as she battles for the only thing she's ever wanted – her father's love …
author: Anfal Khaliq
